post.text: I have such incredible supporters. So many people have downloaded my new America First app and they tell me it's MUCH better than Hillary's - getting TREMENDOUS reviews. Download and enjoy! http://donaldjtrump.com/app

comment.author: Caleb
comment.text: Please do not step into a trap that the Clintons might have planned for you for this Monday debate. I know you will speak your mind but think before speaking. Lets go Trump Train do not get derailed by them

replies.author: Alexandra
replies.text: What trap? Like debating the issues?
